name: One sword is all you need
name_original: One sword is all you need
description:
Unleash your inner warrior and battle an endless horde of possessed weapons! Choose your weapon and upgrade your character to rise above the chaos. Can you survive the never-ending onslaught?

No sound because I did not have time to look for some sound effects sadly :(

Controls:

  • WASD/Arrow Keys to move
  • Shift/Space to shoot
  • Walk up to a weapon and press f to choose it.

Credits:

http://opengameart.org/content/dungeon-crawl-32x32-tiles Tiles + Weapons/Icons
